comment.body:
> It is not a sponsored post on your screenshot, or it is edited. I don't see ads on my ipad.
> 
> Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update. Do not close AdGuard window ~90 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

It was not a “sponsored” post. Rather one of those annoying “suggested” pages. These were all blocked properly, until iOS 17 was released. Since then, Facebook has been winning the battle hands down. Unless of course you have special user rules enabled, I haven’t a clue how you’re not seeing sponsored posts, suggested pages, reels, etc. Again, these were all blocked successfully prior to iOS 17. 

Here’s what happened After following your instructions verbatim…

![IMG_0763](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/116531838/07974a49-0204-465a-8397-40e2483e9f02)
